sense.def:
Z besedo
chiefly
zaznamujemo najpomembnejši cilj ali značilnost nečesa.

seg.quote: The experiment was not a success, chiefly because the machine tools were of poor quality.
They were chiefly interested in making money.

sense.def:
Če je nekaj storjeno
chiefly
na določen način ali na določenem kraju, je storjeno pretežno tako ali tam.
